{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21805v1", "title": "On a Conjecture About the Sum-Freedom of the Binary Multiplicative
  Inverse Function", "summary": "A recent conjecture by C. Carlet on the sum-freedom of the binary
multiplicative inverse function can be stated as follows: For each pair of
positive integers $(n,k)$ with $3\le k\le n-3$, there is a $k$-dimensional
$\Bbb F_2$-subspace $E$ of $\Bbb F_{2^n}$ such that $\sum_{0\ne\in E}1/u=0$. We
confirm this conjecture when $n$ is not a prime.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-30T17:05:55Z"}
